metadata.title: CVE-2014-4927 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in ACME micro_httpd, as used in D-Link DSL2750U andDSL2740U and NetGear WGR614 and MR-ADSL-DG834 routers allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a long string in the URIin a GET request.

criterions.comment: micro-httpd package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
